languages.text: "Идущий нитью Паутины сражается не из ярости, но с холодным разумом. Однако ярость может стать оружием в руках карателя. Я... понимаю это. И принимаю твое благословение, Домин'{name}".

"One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."
languages.original_text: "Идущий нитью Паутины сражается не из ярости, но с холодным разумом. Однако ярость может стать оружием в руках карателя. Я... понимаю это. И принимаю твое благословение, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: "He who walks the path of Ann'shini fights not out of rage, but with a stone-cold mind. However, rage can become a weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand that. And I accept your blessing, Enim'{name}."

"He who walks the path of Ann'shini fights not out of rage, but with a stone-cold mind. However, rage can become a weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand that. And I accept your blessing, Enim'{name}."

"He who walks the path of Ann'shini fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Enim'{name}. I accept your blessing."

"He who walks the path of Ann'shini fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Enim'{name}. I accept your blessing."

"One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."

"One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."

languages.text: "Wer den Fäden des Netzes folgt, kämpft nicht im Zorn, sondern mit eiskaltem Verstand. Dennoch kann Zorn in den Händen von Vollstreckern zu einer starken Waffe werden. Ich ... verstehe, Domin'{name}. Ich nehme Euren Segen an."
languages.original_text: "One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."

traits.locale_text: "Wer den Fäden des Netzes folgt, kämpft nicht im Zorn, sondern mit eiskaltem Verstand. Dennoch kann Zorn in den Händen von Vollstreckern zu einer starken Waffe werden. Ich ... verstehe, Domin'{name}. Ich nehme Euren Segen an."

languages.text: «Quien sigue la Doctrina de la Red no lucha con furia, sino con una mente fría como la piedra. Sin embargo, la ira puede ser un arma poderosa en manos de un castigador. Lo... entiendo, Domin'{name}. Acepto su bendición».
languages.original_text: "One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."

traits.locale_text: «Quien sigue la Doctrina de la Red no lucha con furia, sino con una mente fría como la piedra. Sin embargo, la ira puede ser un arma poderosa en manos de un castigador. Lo... entiendo, Domin'{name}. Acepto su bendición».

languages.text: 「ウェブの糸をたどる者は、怒りではなく、石のように冷たい心で戦う。とはいえ、罰を与える者が怒りを手にすれば強力な武器となる。私は…わかったわ、ドミン・{name}。あなたの祝福を受け入れる」
languages.original_text: "One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェブの糸をたどる者は、怒りではなく、石のように冷たい心で戦う。とはいえ、罰を与える者が怒りを手にすれば強力な武器となる。私は…わかったわ、ドミン・{name}。あなたの祝福を受け入れる」

languages.text: “追随教义之人并非受怒火驱使，而是怀着冰冷的心，犹如坚石一般。不过，愤怒确实可以成为复仇者手中的强大武器。我……可以理解，秘者{name}，我接受你的祝福。”
languages.original_text: "One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."

traits.locale_text: “追随教义之人并非受怒火驱使，而是怀着冰冷的心，犹如坚石一般。不过，愤怒确实可以成为复仇者手中的强大武器。我……可以理解，秘者{name}，我接受你的祝福。”

languages.text: « Celui qui suit le fil de la Toile ne laisse pas la rage le guider au combat, mais conserve à son esprit la froideur d'une pierre, même si la fureur peut s'avérer une arme puissante entre les mains de celui qui châtie. Je... comprends, Domin'{name}. J'accepte votre bénédiction. »
languages.original_text: "One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."

traits.locale_text: « Celui qui suit le fil de la Toile ne laisse pas la rage le guider au combat, mais conserve à son esprit la froideur d'une pierre, même si la fureur peut s'avérer une arme puissante entre les mains de celui qui châtie. Je... comprends, Domin'{name}. J'accepte votre bénédiction. »

languages.text: "Ağ'ın ipliğini takip eden, öfkeden ziyade tepeden tırnağa duygulardan arınmış bir zihinle savaşır. Öfke, her hâlükârda cezalandıran ellerde etkili bir silaha dönüşür. Bunu... Anlıyorum Domin'{name}. Lütfunu kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "One who follows the thread of the Web fights not out of rage, but with a mind as cold as stone. Nevertheless, rage can become a potent weapon in the hands of a punisher. I... understand, Domin'{name}. I accept your blessing."
